name: madrilene
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a consommé (= thin, clear soup) flavoured with tomatoes, often eaten cold: Madrilene is flavoured with tomatoes and may be served hot, chilled, or jellied. She ordered consommé madrilène, sole florentine, and raspberry ice cream.
More examplesFewer examplesProducing madrilene without just opening a can means making stock from scratch. Until the 1970s, the selection of cold soups was limited to vichyssoise and jellied consommé madrilene.Consommé Madrilene is one of the classics served in French restaurants or homes.
